item.description:
A model shoot featuring Lily

 

Here is an opportunity to improve your studio & glamour photography skills. Lily will be modeling a couple of different outfits.   The fee must be paid in advance. To ensure each attendee has enough time to shoot, we are limiting this event to 10 photographers.

Lily is a native of Thailand. $5 of each ticket will be donated to Thai Flood Relief. If any member would like to make an additional donation, we will be glad to accept it. Please contact us for more

(Please note this shoot will start at 7:30PM)

 


 

Additional requirements:

1) Your dSLR needs to have a hot shoe that can trigger a pocket wizard, or you have a PC sync jack on your camera, or you have a pop up flash

2) You know how to put your camera into manual mode so you can adjust shutter speed and aperture independently

3) For your pop up flash, you know how to set that to manual output, lowest setting, typically 1/128 power

4) You know how to select flash white balance Recommended lens focal length: 50 mm or higher on a full frame, 35mm or higher on a cropped frame sensor, and ISO 200
item.name: A Model Shoot Featuring Lily
